snippet.title: Fera: The Sundered Tribes - Official Developer Preview Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join developer Massive Damage Games for a look at gameplay, colony sim mechanics, the aerial combat system, monsters, and more from Fera: The Sundered Tribes. Fera. ahead of the game's launch into Early Access in summer 2024. The Sundered Tribes is a mixture of monster-hunting survival action RPG with village building and tribe management in a unique post-apocalyptic fantastical world of untamed magic and ancient secrets,
